text: Nabiyow Ni-Astootiy atu Yallih farmoyta kinnitoomuh sumaaqitta Nummaysa mari kol yemeetek, assalaamu qaleykum keenik ixxic, sin Rabbi Racmatta isi nafsil yuktubeeh waajibiseh, diggah umaane siinik abe num iggimat tet abay hinnay Aaxaguk tet abay tohuk lakal sarra Yallal gaceeh yotoobeeh isi taama yessemeqqek, toysa diggah Yalli dambi cabtili xuwawli kinni isi naqoosah
